question: Do you see yourself at work where you mainly deal with the visual aspects?
Do you prefer to create solutions for mobile devices rather than for the web?

answers.description: Mobile Developer is a person that specializes in the developemnt and improvement of software system that is adapted to mobile devices. Possible paths are working on iOS or Android system.

question: Would you like to work a lot with markup languages?
Do you want to focus only on the visual aspects of the website or also on issues related to the performance and capacity ?

answers.description: Front-end Developer is a person responsible for the appearance and development of the user interface of the websites for many devices.

Web Developer is a person that specializes in websites and web applications development. What is more, part of their job is to taking care of proper functioning of website form programming point of view. For them it is important to know programming languages like HTML / CSS, C #, Ruby or PHP.

question: Do you prefer to create solutions for mobile devices rather than for the web?

answers.description: Mobile Developer is a person that specializes in the developemnt and improvement of software system that is adapted to mobile devices. Possible paths are working on iOS or Android system.

question: Are you fascinated by games and want to see your future with it?

answers.description: Game Developer is a person that is working on planning, designing, but mostly implementing video games for different devices and consoles with help of game engins and programming languages.

question: Do you see yourself working with all the software and not just the website?

answers.description: Full-stack developer is a person that deals not only about visal aspects of a product, but also about logical mechanics, its operations, server and databases. So we can call it a person that is responsible for everything.

question: Do you have knowledge of cloud solutions and would you like to work with them?

answers.description: Cloud Engineer is a person whose job is to take care of the cloud computing. They have to plan, manage and design cloud-based internet services.

question: Do you want to focus only on the visual aspects of the website or also on issues related to the performance and capacity?

answers.description: Front-end Developer is a person responsible for the appearance and development of the user interface of the websites for many devices.

Web Developer is a person that specializes in websites and web applications development. What is more, part of their job is to taking care of proper functioning of website form programming point of view. For them it is important to know programming languages like HTML / CSS, C #, Ruby or PHP.

question: Do you want to build solutions based on artificial intelligence?

answers.description: Artificial Intelligence Engineer is the person who is responsible for optimizing the models so that the model can be placed on the market. They care for the purity of the code and maintenance of the technical side of the solution in accordance with good practice.

question: Would you like to deal with business issues in addition to programming?

answers.description: DevOps Engineer is a person that works with two components of software: its development and maintanance. This person produces software and then manage related systems.
Back-end Developer is a person that takes care of application or website from behind, so creates and develops solutions in services thanks to APIs.
